DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the prognosis of coronary stenosis based on intracoronary Imaging.
DOC.brief_title: Prognosis of Coronary Stenosis Based on Intracoronary Imaging; A Multicenter, Prospective Observational Study
DOC.criteria: Patients with intracoronary imaging Written consent Severe calcification and/or severe tortuosity Lesion with previous bypass graft surgery (CABG) Left ventricular ejection fraction less than 30 % Coronary spasm Life expectancy less than 2 years Pregnancy or breastfeeding
